naslov: Ekskluzivno imanje sa dvije vile, 583 m2- Murter (prodaja)
opis: Prodaju se dvije ekskluzivne vile bogato opremljene raznim sadržajima. Građene sa ljubavlju i pažnjom na detalje, kombinacijom suvremenih i tradicionalnih materijala. Velika privatna okućnica od 2900m2 gotovo kao resort. Od sadržaja tu su unutarnji grijani bazen, jacuzzi, sauna, fitnes, konoba, komin, terasa, tuševi, dječji park, praonica.. Jedna vila ima 2 velike stambene jedinice sa posebnim ulazom. Svaka stambena jedinica sastoji se od dvije sobe, kuhinje, blagovaonice, dnevnog boravka i terase, ukupno 4 sobe stambene površine 333m2. Druga vila ima dvije stambene jedinice sa posebnim ulazom također sa po dvije sobe, kuhinjom, blagovaonicom, dnevnim boravkom i terasama ukupne površine 250m2. Blizina mora i marine. ____________________________________ Two exclusive villas for sale, richly equipped with various amenities. Built with love and attention to details, a combination of modern and traditional materials. Large private yard of 2900m2 almost as a resort. From the contents, there are an indoor heated swimming pool, Jacuzzi, sauna, fitness room, tavern, fireplace, terrace, showers, children's park, laundry. One villa has 2 large living units with separate entrance. Each living unit consists of two bedrooms, a kitchen, a dining room, a living room and a terrace, a total of 4 rooms with a living space of 333m2. The second villa has two living units with a separate entrance also with two bedrooms, kitchen, dining room, living room and terraces of a total surface of 250m2. Close to sea and marina.
Grijanje: Sustav grijanja: Sustav grijanja, klimatizacije i ventilacije
